5B1CD0294B19B790CEE3B5974F097FBB:
Heroes Mastery includes crafting recipes for <Research>Hero Weapons</> and <Research>Ability Equipment</> items, as well as <Research>Passive Effects</>.

Use your collected Essence to Learn an item, then fulfill requirements to Unlock it!  Unlocked recipes can be crafted at the <Research>Hero Station</>, which can be discovered by collecting granite and then built from the <Research>Build Menu</>.

Once Unlocked, <Research>Passive Effects</> will automatically be applied to specified weapons as long as they meet the rarity requirements of the Effects.
7A2D475343B4E45A60D5CABB82E919AD: This <Research>Passive Effect</> will apply to any rarity of <Research>{Theme} Ability Equipment</> equipped.
5A23004B4E60012AC25115820A8CDEDA: This <Research>Passive Effect</> will apply to any rarity of <Research>{Theme} Weapon</> equipped.
